backend/main.mo: Defines canister data models and storage maps for members, referrals, donations, certificates, beneficiaries, campaigns, enquiries, and profiles with access-control‑protected profile queries and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Lists evidence for the repository-level export feature, including involved files, components, and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains pre-written summaries of various frontend source files for documentation or tooling use.
frontend/EXPORT_PROJECT.md: Documentation explaining how to export the full project source into a ZIP archive.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file that mounts the frontend app and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/scripts/export_project.py: Python utility that walks the repository and creates a ZIP of the source while excluding build and dependency folders.
frontend/scripts/export-project.sh: Shell script that checks Python, prepares the export directory, and runs the Python ZIP generator.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for public, admin, and member areas with layout wrappers and route guards.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Implements a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication state and retries.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal prompting new authenticated users to submit their name and creates their profile.
Provides route guards for authenticated users, admins, and members with loading and redirect logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with sidebar navigation, mobile drawer, profile display, and login controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Defines the public-facing layout with header navigation, footer, and login button.
frontend/src/components/QRCode.tsx: Canvas-based placeholder QR code generator that renders a pseudo-random grid and corner markers based on the input value.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Fetches authentication state, user profile, role, and admin status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating members, donations, campaigns, certificates, and other backend data via an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: Displays an access‑denied message with navigation back to the home page.
Renders the admin dashboard with summary stats for members, donations, campaigns, and certificates.
frontend/src/pages/admin/beneficiaries/B: Displays a table of beneficiaries with loading state and navigation to detail or creation pages.
Placeholder page showing beneficiary details will be added later.
Placeholder form page for adding a new beneficiary.
frontend/src/pages/admin/campaigns/Campa: Placeholder page for viewing detailed campaign information.
Placeholder form page for creating a new campaign.
Lists campaigns with progress indicators and navigation to details or creation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/certificates/Ce: Shows certificate details with QR code, download option, and error/loading handling.
Form for creating and submitting new certificates, generating IDs and saving via mutation.
Lists all certificates with basic details and navigation to issue or view individual certificates.
frontend/src/pages/admin/donations/Donat: Displays detailed information for a specific donation with navigation and receipt viewing.
Form for recording a new donation, generating IDs and submitting via mutation.
Renders a printable donation receipt with donor info, amount, and QR verification.
Lists all donations with search filtering and navigation to add or view details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/enquiries/Enqui: Displays all enquiries in a table with status indicators and links to detail pages, using a loading state while fetching data.
Placeholder page showing a simple card for enquiry details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/members/MemberD: Shows detailed member information with actions to block, unblock, or deactivate, handling loading and missing-member states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/members/MemberF: Placeholder form page for adding new members.
frontend/src/pages/admin/members/Members: Lists all members with search filtering, status badges, and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/reports/Reports: Displays a grid of report categories, each marked as coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/member/MemberDashboar: Shows the logged‑in member’s profile details and placeholder quick actions.
frontend/src/pages/public/ActivityFeed.t: Static page showing a placeholder for public activity updates.
frontend/src/pages/public/EnquiryForm.ts: Public enquiry submission form that validates input and sends enquiries via a mutation.
frontend/src/pages/public/Landing.tsx: Public landing page with a hero section, feature highlights, and calls to action for registration and enquiries.
frontend/src/pages/public/MemberRegistra: React form page for registering a new member, handling input fields, photo upload, and submitting data via useRegisterMember.
frontend/src/pages/public/Verify.tsx: Displays verification results for certificates or donations by ID, showing success or failure states using fetched data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the NGO management system, its features, requirements, architecture notes, and current state version.
